name: Lemonade (Commodore Educational Software)
overview: Commodore's version of one of the oldest, if not the very oldest computer business management simulations to ever exist. It's the classic lemonade stand simulation that has been around since the 70s done with Commodore flare. The C64 version was a conversion of the PET version. This was included in the Commodore 64 Program Pack that was sold in Canada.
